oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Bonita Hill - 2018-01-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriter Bonita Hill from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on January 13, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bonita Hill;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments by Abi Tapia begin in progress with introduction of Bonita Hill / (02:32) Opening comments by Bonita Hill / (03:07) Introduction of first song / (03:47) Performs More Money / (05:44) Talks about songs she's had recorded / (06:20) Intros the next song / (09:17) Performs Two Pina Coladas / (12:33) Talks about Garth Brooks / (12:54) Answers question about her piano playing / (04:19) Answers question about her musical influences / (15:59) Answers question about her songwriting and performance career with the Allman Brothers band / (19:00) Intros the next song / (20:55) Performs Old Love Letters / (23:37) Intros the next song / (24:40) Performs Sending You The Light Of My Love / (28:05) Answers question about lyrics or melody coming first / (29:06) Answers question about her favorite song she's written / (29:50) Performs Just A Dream / (33:44) Answers question about the song copyright process and protecting her rights to songs /

(36:52) Answers question about life's experiences impacting her songwriting / (38:19) Intros the next song / (39:35) Performs It's Your Song / (42:55) Closing comments / (43:23) Walk out music / (48:04) Walk out music ends / (48:25) Sounds of striking the stage / (01:03:46) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hill, Bonita; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
